title: Anthony Martial looks to mix tap-ins with his usual 'beautiful' goals
text:
Anthony Martial has scored 50 times in 177 appearances for Manchester United, many of which have been incredibly easy on the eye.

However, he is looking to add a few more ugly goals to his game, like the one he scored against Chelsea on the opening day of the season, to improve his scoring record.

'If I could score 30 goals like I scored in the game against Chelsea, I would take that right now!' Martial told the club magazine Inside United.

Anthony Martial is looking to improve his goal scoring record for Manchester United

Martial wants to score more ugly goals, like the one he got against Chelsea this season

'We all prefer beautiful goals but, at the end of the day, a goal is still a goal,' said the French forward.

'I guess I have tended to score quite nice goals and so, if I managed to score more of this kind of goal, in addition to the more spectacular ones, then I'd end up with a much higher goals total come the end of the season.'

Martial has only surpassed 10 goals in a Premier League season twice since joining United in 2015. He got 11 in 2015-16, and 10 in 2018-19, scoring just four and nine in the other two seasons.

He got off to a good start this season with a goal against Chelsea and against Wolves in his first two games.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer gave Martial back the No 9 shirt and expects more goals from him

However, he picked up an injury against Crystal Palace back in August and has been out of action since then.

Now that Romelu Lukaku has departed for Inter Milan, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer will be looking to Martial to step up in the goals department if United are to improve, especially now he has taken back the iconic No 9 shirt.

They're currently in the midst of their worst start to a Premier League season for 30 years, and face league leaders Liverpool on Sunday.

'Now that I've taken the No 9 shirt back once again, all he [Solskjaer] has said to me is that I have a lot of responsibility and that I have to score goals, so that's what I am trying to do,' the forward concluded.
description: Anthony Martial has scored 50 times in 177 appearances for Manchester United, and quite a lot of those have been impressive efforts.
